history.q: How do payments work on Shakers?
history.a: On Shakers, clients deposit funds in escrow via credit card or PayPal. Once approved, funds are released.

history.q: What is a freelancer on Shakers?
history.a: A freelancer is a self-employed professional who offers services on Shakers by creating a profile and bidding on projects.

history.q: How do I post a project?
history.a: Go to Dashboard > Post a Project, fill in details and submit.

history.q: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?
history.a: Yes, you can dispute the payment and request a refund via Support Center.
